description:
In the darkness while a breaker at Cafe Poirot is blown, someone stabs Anzai in the back with a knife. Megure suspects one of Yui, Ozumi, Nagatsuka, or Wada did it. Conan and Heiji discover the trick the culprit used to prevent the victim`s blood from getting on himself, but the only person who could`ve used the trick couldn`t have committed the crime. Conan tries to uncover the truth behind Yui and Anzai`s relationship. Later, Wada suddenly recites a poem from One Hundred Poems by One Hundred Poets, which provides the hint Conan and his friends need to determine the culprit and the trick he used that enabled him to carry out his crime...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Résolution d`énigme au café Poirot (2e partie)
Solving Mysteries at the Poirot Cafe (Part 2)
حل الأحُجية في مقهى پوارو (الجزء الثاني)
謎解きは喫茶ポアロで (後編)
